verses.name: Hebrews 11:12
verses.text: Therefore sprang there even of one, and him as good as dead, so many as the stars of the sky in multitude, and as the sand which is by the sea shore innumerable.

verses.name: Hebrews 11:13
verses.text: These all died in faith, not having received the promises, but having seen them afar off, and were persuaded of them, and embraced them, and confessed that they were strangers and pilgrims on the earth.

verses.name: Hebrews 11:14
verses.text: For they that say such things declare plainly that they seek a country.
